locations.description: The sun is setting on a clear night under a full moon. You are standing on a quiet dirt road in front of an old, run-down mansion.
You go to the front porch and knock on the door. No one answers. The door is slightly ajar.
locations.description-visited: You are to the front porch. The door is slightly ajar.

locations.description: As you enter, the front door slams shut and locks behind you. Now you are inside a large foyer. There is a staircase which leads up to the second floor. There are rooms to the east and west of you. A body is lying on the floor.
locations.description-visited: You are inside a large foyer. There is a staircase which leads up to the second floor. There are rooms to the east and west of you. A body is lying on the floor.

locations.description: The man is dead, but it is not clear why. You find a note on the body that says, 'Valuable jewels are hidden in this house. Finders keepers!'
You are in a kitchen.
You are in a dining room.
You are in a hallway at the top of the stairs. The hallway goes north, east, and west.
You are at the end of a hallway. There is a door to the north. The hallway extends to the south.
You are at the end of a hallway. There is a door to the east. The hallway extends to the west.
You are at the end of a hallway. There is a door to the west. The hallway extends to the east.
You are in a bedroom.
You are in a bedroom.
You are in a bedroom. On one wall there is a small closet. A small window looks outside to the west.
You see trees.
The closet is empty except for a small box on the top shelf and woman's coat which is hanging on the rack.
Everything in the house is worn and dusty, but the coat appears to be very new and clean. Inside the left pocket, a tag sewn in with the letters 'FUNXR GUR OBK' written on it in pen.
The box is empty.
You discover that the box has a false bottom. Inside, you see a small key.
locations.description-item-taken: There is a false bottom, but nothing is inside.

locations.description: You take the key and put it in your pocket and set the box back on the shelf just like you found it.
You are in a bathroom.
